title: Lozen Jesse Top
description:
Your most supportive bikini top, ever.
The Jesse Top features a fully adjustable knot-front design made to flatter and lift, with customizable straps and removable padding for the perfect fit. This top blends style and support without sacrificing comfort.

✔️ Supportive fit for all sizes—including DDD
✔️ Removable padding for personalized coverage
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, eco-friendly fabric with UPF 50+ protection

title: Murex Kai Bottom
description:
Made to move with you.
The Kai Bottom delivers minimal coverage with a sporty, stay-put fit designed for comfort, confidence, and flawless tan lines. Featuring thin sides and a flattering scrunch back, it can be worn low on the hips or pulled up higher for a long-leg look. 

✔️ Skimpy coverage with a flattering scrunch back
✔️ Thin sides for a smooth, no-pinch fit
✔️ Wear low-rise or pulled higher on the hips
✔️ Ideal for active lifestyles
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Canopy Brayden Bottom
description:
Brayden is the kind of bottom you reach for every single beach day.
The Brayden Bottom has been a customer favorite since 2016, thanks to its wide, stay-put side bands and ultra-flattering scrunch back. Designed to smooth without digging in, it moves with you, whether you wear it pulled higher on the hips or low and relaxed. 

✔️ Wide side bands for a smooth, secure fit
✔️ Scrunched back detail that enhances shape
✔️ Flattering on both smaller bums and fuller curves
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, and UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Indigo Brayden Bottom
description:
Brayden is the kind of bottom you reach for every single beach day.
The Brayden Bottom has been a customer favorite since 2016, thanks to its wide, stay-put side bands and ultra-flattering scrunch back. Designed to smooth without digging in, it moves with you, whether you wear it pulled higher on the hips or low and relaxed. 

✔️ Wide side bands for a smooth, secure fit
✔️ Scrunched back detail that enhances shape
✔️ Flattering on both smaller bums and fuller curves
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, and UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Capri Parker Bottom
description:
Effortless coverage, flattering fit.
The Parker Bottom is your go-to for family-friendly beach days with a sleek, low-rise silhouette and thin sides that stay put without digging in. Designed for fuller coverage without the bulk, these bottoms sculpt smoothly to your shape—no sagging, no fuss, just confidence.

  • Low-rise design with thin, stay-in-place sides

  • Full back coverage that still flatters your shape

  • Made with ultra-soft Xtra Life LYCRA® for lasting stretch and support

  • OEKO-TEX® certified, UPF 50+, and PETA-approved vegan

Your wear-anywhere bottom—secure, smoothing, and built to move with you.

title: Capri Stevie Bottom
description:
Cut-out detail, confidence included.
The Stevie Bottom is a mid-rise dream with cheeky coverage and sleek side cut-outs for a modern, flattering look. Its fuller front and smooth, secure fit give you that feel-good balance, more coverage without losing any of the style.

✔️ Mid-rise fit with side cut-out accents
✔️ Cheeky back with fuller front coverage
✔️ Sits smoothly and securely on the hips
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified with UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Capri Noah Bottom
description:
Flattering rise, playful cheeky back.
The Noah Bottom is a mid-rise style that sits just below the belly button, offering a soft, stay-put waistband and cheeky back coverage. With a bit more side coverage and a curve-enhancing fit, it strikes the perfect balance between comfortable and flirty, ideal for anyone who loves a higher rise without losing that fun, laid-back feel.

✔️ Mid-waist fit with a smooth, secure top band
✔️ Cheeky back with added side coverage
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified and UPF 50+ sun protection
✔️ Confidence meets comfort, every swim

title: Mai Tai Zuri Bottom
description:
Tiny but mighty—built to stay put.
The Zuri Bottom is a double-string essential with slide-adjustable front and back coverage. Minimal enough for seamless tanning, yet secure enough for wave-catching confidence, this is your go-to for barely-there style that still knows how to perform.

  • Ultra-minimal coverage
  • Adjustable front and back fit
  • Double-string sides for a custom rise
  • Recommended to size up in this style
  • OEKO-TEX® certified, eco-friendly fabric
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
  • Ethically made and PETA-approved vegan

Where minimal meets unshakable.

title: Pua Nora Top
description:
Minimalist, modern, and made to move.
The Nora Top blends sleek design with secure support, featuring a flattering cutout and a slip-on fit that stays put. With adjustable straps, removable padding, and a wide underbust band, it’s built for comfort, confidence, and effortless all-day wear.

✔️ Keyhole detail for just the right amount of reveal
✔️ Wide underbust band for secure, supportive fit
✔️ Adjustable straps + removable padding
✔️ No clasps, no hardware—smooth, slip-on comfort
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified with UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Pua Cruz Bottom
description:
Confidence, turned all the way up.
The Cruz Bottom is our smallest bottom with minimal coverage and ultra-thin sides that sit smooth on the hips. Style it high or wear it at the waist—this barely-there thong was made to move with you and keep tan lines minimal.

  • Minimal-coverage thong bikini bottom

  • Ultra-thin, non-adjustable sides

  • OEKO-TEX® certified with UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Pua Tanner Bottom
description:
Confident coverage, sculpted fit.
The Tanner Bottom is a nearly full-coverage bikini bottom designed for comfort, confidence, and all-day wear. With a slightly higher front rise than the Parker, it offers a flattering fit that hugs your curves without sagging or shifting—making it perfect for family beach days and active outings alike.

  • Mid-rise front for added coverage and a secure feel

  • Smoothing design with nearly full back coverage

  • No-sag fit that stays in place without pinching

  • Made with ultra-soft Xtra Life LYCRA® for lasting stretch and support

  • OEKO-TEX® certified, UPF 50+, and PETA-approved vegan

The Tanner: secure, sculpting, and perfect for your next sunny escape.

title: Pippa Tanner Bottom
description: The Tanner bottom offers almost full coverage without any sagging to ensure the most flattering fit. The style is especially ideal for family occasions with a slightly higher front rise compared to the Parker style.

✔️ Wear low-rise or pulled higher on the hips
✔️ Ideal for active lifestyles
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Mystery Bikini Bottom
description: Mystery Bikinis are final sale. They're random pieces from past collections with the same sizing as our current line—styles and colors vary, and you won’t know what you’re getting ‘til it arrives!

title: Lozen Men's Boardshorts
description:
Made to move, built to last.

These boardshorts are designed for everything from surf sessions to beach days and everything in between. With a clean, tailored waistband and a high-performance 4-way stretch fabric, they’re comfortable, durable, and ready for action.

The antimicrobial finish keeps things fresh, while the quick-dry material means you’re never stuck in soggy shorts. A side notch at the hem gives you extra range of motion where it counts, and the zippered back pocket is perfect for stashing keys or cards without worry.

Details:

  • Regular waistband with secure tie closure (no elastic)

  • Antimicrobial, 4-way stretch fabric

  • Quick-drying, breathable, and lightweight

  • Side notched hem for added mobility

  • Zippered back pocket with drainage grommet

  • Made with sustainable materials

These are the boardshorts you’ll want to live in—built for comfort, made for movement.

title: Marigold Jax Bottom
description: When a bikini bottom with scrunch just isn't your style, the v-front, cheeky coverage of the Jax bikini bottom makes it a perfect choice. Embrace a style that seamlessly hugs your curves without digging in & experience comfort all day long!

title: Laylow Boy's Classic Swim Trunk
description:
Make waves, stay cool, and play all day.

The Blue Laylow boardshorts for boys are built for beach days, pool adventures, and everything in between.

With a soft, stretchy inner lining and an easy-on elastic waistband, these shorts are made for comfort and nonstop fun. The quick-dry, breathable outer fabric is eco-friendly and tough enough for swimming, surfing, or just chilling in the sun.

Features:

  • Elastic waistband with tie for a snug fit

  • Soft spandex-blend inner lining for comfy wear

  • Lightweight, quick-dry, and breathable

  • Made with eco-friendly, sustainable materials

  • Back pocket with grommet drain for all-day play

So comfy, he won’t want to take them off

title: Laylow Men's Classic Swim Trunk
description:
Stand out, cool down, and dive in.

The Blue Laylow boardshorts are made for laid-back beach day and comfortable all-day wear.

They are designed with a soft, stretchy inner lining for all-day comfort and an elastic waistband. The breathable, quick-dry outer shell is eco-friendly ready for whatever your day throws at you—surf, swim, or sun.

Features:

  • Elastic waistband with tie

  • Soft, spandex-blend inner lining for next-to-skin comfort

  • Quick-dry, lightweight, and breathable

  • Eco-friendly, made with sustainable materials

  • Functional back pocket with grommet drain

The most comfortable boardshorts you’ve ever worn—guaranteed.

title: Talise Kinsley Top
description:
Made for movement, crafted for confidence.
The Kinsley Top is your go-to for surf, swim, and everything in between. Its signature twist-front design can be worn two ways...twisted for a sculpted, lifted look or untwisted for a classic, comfortably supportive fit. 

✔️ Wear it two ways: with or without the twist
✔️ Twist-front design flatters and sculpts + removable padding
✔️ Easy slip-on style with no hardware
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, eco-friendly fabric with UPF 50+

title: Zoya Kinsley Top
description:
Made for movement, crafted for confidence.
The Kinsley Top is your go-to for surf, swim, and everything in between. Its signature twist-front design can be worn two ways...twisted for a sculpted, lifted look or untwisted for a classic, comfortably supportive fit. 

✔️ Wear it two ways: with or without the twist
✔️ Twist-front design flatters and sculpts + removable padding
✔️ Easy slip-on style with no hardware
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, eco-friendly fabric with UPF 50+

title: Zoya Clover Bottom
description:
The string bottom you'll reach for again and again.
The Clover Bottom pairs cheeky coverage with adjustable string ties for a customizable fit that flatters every curve. Wear it higher on the hips for a long-leg look or wear it lower for a classic low-rise vibe. With minimal tan lines and maximum comfort, it’s the timeless string silhouette every swim drawer needs.

✔️ Cheeky back coverage
✔️ Adjustable string ties for a custom fit
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified and UPF 50+ sun protection
✔️ Light, versatile, and built for endless beach days

title: Zoya Kai Bottom
description:
Made to move with you.
The Kai Bottom delivers minimal coverage with a sporty, stay-put fit designed for comfort, confidence, and flawless tan lines. Featuring thin sides and a flattering scrunch back, it can be worn low on the hips or pulled up higher for a long-leg look. 

✔️ Skimpy coverage with a flattering scrunch back
✔️ Thin sides for a smooth, no-pinch fit
✔️ Wear low-rise or pulled higher on the hips
✔️ Ideal for active lifestyles
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Tide Whale Tale Bottom
description:
A classic that never quits.
The Whale Tale Bottom has been a Midori icon since 2013, and for good reason. Its wide, stay-put waistband smooths without digging in, while the cheeky cut flatters from every angle. Wear it higher on the hips for a legs-for-days look or sit it lower on the waist for a classic, easygoing fit. Perfect for surfing, active days, and anyone who loves a little extra cheek.

✔️ Wide, no-dig waistband for a smooth feel
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, eco-friendly fabric and UPF 50+ sun protection
✔️ A Midori icon, made to flatter

title: Malta Hana Top
description:
Shape it your way.
The Hana Top gives you total control over your fit with its adjustable tie-front design—tighten for extra lift or loosen for more coverage. Fixed shoulder straps keep everything secure and stay-put, while removable padding lets you fine-tune your support. Comfortable, versatile, and endlessly flattering.

✔️ Tie-front design for adjustable lift and coverage
✔️ Fixed shoulder straps that stay securely in place
✔️ Removable padding for customizable support
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified with UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Malta Cruz Bottom
description:
Confidence, turned all the way up.
The Cruz Bottom is our smallest bottom with minimal coverage and ultra-thin sides that sit smooth on the hips. Style it high or wear it at the waist—this barely-there thong was made to move with you and keep tan lines minimal.

  • Minimal-coverage thong bikini bottom

  • Ultra-thin, non-adjustable sides

  • OEKO-TEX® certified with UPF 50+ sun protection

title: Nelly Jesse Top
description:
Your most supportive bikini top, ever.
The Jesse Top features a fully adjustable knot-front design made to flatter and lift, with customizable straps and removable padding for the perfect fit. This top blends style and support without sacrificing comfort.

✔️ Supportive fit for all sizes—including DDD
✔️ Removable padding for personalized coverage
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, eco-friendly fabric with UPF 50+ protection

title: Nelly Kai Bottom
description:
Built to move.
The Kai bikini bottom blends minimal coverage with a sporty, stay-put fit. Designed with ultra-thin sides and a scrunched back, it can be worn low on the hips or pulled up higher on your sides. A staple for cheeky bikini lovers and active beach days alike, Kai stays exactly where you want her and gives you the perfect tan—whether you’re diving into waves or spiking on the sand.

  • Skimpy coverage with a flattering scrunch back

  • Thin sides for a no-pinch fit

  • Wear low-rise or higher on the hips

  • Especially deal for surfers, swimmers, and volleyball players

  • OEKO-TEX® certified, eco-friendly swim fabric

  • UPF 50+ sun protection

  • Ethically made and PETA-approved vegan

Bringing confidence to every sun-soaked move.

title: Nelly Brayden Bottom
description:
Brayden is the kind of bottom you reach for every single beach day.
The Brayden Bottom has been a customer favorite since 2016, thanks to its wide, stay-put side bands and ultra-flattering scrunch back. Designed to smooth without digging in, it moves with you, whether you wear it pulled higher on the hips or low and relaxed. 

✔️ Wide side bands for a smooth, secure fit
✔️ Scrunched back detail that enhances shape
✔️ Flattering on both smaller bums and fuller curves
✔️ OEKO-TEX® certified, and UPF 50+ sun protection
